# Simple Pie Chart

This page demonstrates a simple pie chart.

```{python}
#| echo: false
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

labels = ['Craig Actually Coded', "Craig Should've Coded"]
sizes = [1, 99]
colors = ['#1d70b8', '#b1b4b6']

fig, ax = plt.subplots()
ax.pie(
    sizes,
    labels=labels,
    colors=colors,
    autopct='%1.1f%%',
    startangle=90,
    textprops={'fontsize': 12, 'color': '#0b0c0c'}
)
ax.axis('equal')
ax.set_title("Craig's Coding in 20 Years", fontsize=16, color='#1d70b8')

fig 
```
